meanings.definition: The necessary ingredients or components for a particular dish or meal.
meanings.sent1: I need to buy the fixings for the tacos tonight.
meanings.sent2: The salad bar had a variety of fresh fixings to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The chef forgot the fixings for the pizza, so it ended up just being plain dough.
meanings.sent4: Her famous chili recipe includes all the fixings for a hearty meal.
meanings.sent5: The picnic basket was filled with all the fixings for a delicious outdoor feast.

meanings.definition: The act of fastening or securing something in place.
meanings.sent1: He used a hammer and nails for the fixings on the loose board.
meanings.sent2: The fixings on the tent were strong enough to withstand the storm.
meanings.sent3: The fixings on the broken shelf were so loose, it kept falling apart.
meanings.sent4: The fixings on the gate were rusty and needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent5: The fixings on the window were secure, keeping the cold air out.
